name: output_image_surrealizer_diffusers
description: Surrealizer via Diffusers — token-level CLIP-L/T5 extrapolation with selectable fusion strategy. Sweet spot: α=15-35.

prompt.description: Text prompt — encoded separately by CLIP-L (77 tokens, visual) and T5-XXL (512 tokens, linguistic)

alpha_factor.description: Extrapolation factor: 0=pure CLIP-L (normal), 1=pure T5, 15-35=surreal sweet spot. Negative α: CLIP-L amplified, T5 negated. Formula depends on fusion_strategy.

fusion_strategy.description: Fusion strategy: 'legacy' = LERP first 77, rest unchanged (original ComfyUI behavior). 'dual_alpha' = gentle α on first 77 (structural anchor), full α on 78+ (surprise). 'normalized' = uniform α everywhere, L2-normalized to reference magnitude.

negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt — fused with same alpha as positive (matches original ComfyUI workflow)

meta.notes: Token-level fusion with 3 strategies. CLIP-L (768d, padded to 4096d) and T5-XXL (4096d) encode independently. The 768d/4096d asymmetry enables extrapolation. 'legacy': LERP first 77, append rest unchanged (original ComfyUI node). 'dual_alpha': core_α=α*0.15 on first 77 tokens (structural anchor), full α on 78+ (semantic surprise). 'normalized': uniform α on all positions (CLIP=0 beyond 77), then L2-normalize each token to mean T5 magnitude.
